name: Defenders: The Road to Ruin
description:
A traditional, homemade RPG, inspired by the classics!

Join Geoffrey and his vigilante team, the Defenders, on their journey across Assegon and the ancient Realms! Discover the secrets of the Weapons of Ruin, pass the trials of the Old Heroes, and learn the truth of the world!

Featuring classic ATB combat, 7-person party management, dungeon crawling, and weakness management, this is a bite-sized take on the traditional experience.

Tailor the game to your preferences with 5 separate difficulty options- for casual or hardcore players alike!

Fast pacing and a short runtime offer easy replayability and experimentation!
